detection_goal: Catch when PowerShell spawns a script/executable child (bat/cmd/ps1/exe/dll) instead of benign Explorer launches.
completion: <group name="custom_sysmon_rules,process_injection,lab"><rule id="100601" level="12"><if_group>sysmon</if_group><field name="win.eventdata.parentImage">*\\powershell.exe</field><match>*.{bat,cmd,ps1,exe,dll}</match><description>Lab: PowerShell launched a suspicious script/executable child</description><group>sysmon,windows,lab_suspicious_child,</group></rule></group>

detection_goal: Alert when a Windows user logs in from multiple remote locations rapidly or when successful logons are preceded by frequent failures.
completion: <group name="custom_windows_rules,authentication"><rule id="100602" level="12"><if_group>windows_security</if_group><frequency>5</frequency><timeframe>3600</timeframe><description>Lab: Frequent/failing logons indicating possible credential abuse</description><group>authentication_success,lab_risky_logon,</group></rule></group>

detection_goal: Flag when sudo to root runs operations like service restarts that could indicate lateral movement or post-exploitation activity.
completion: <group name="local,sudo,privilege_escalation"><rule id="100603" level="12"><if_group>sudo</if_group><match>COMMAND=.*systemctl restart</match><description>Lab: root invoked via sudo to restart services after compromise</description><group>sudo,lab_root_use,</group></rule></group>

detection_goal: Detect installs of developer tools (e.g., Neovim) that occur without change control, especially when they follow suspicious activity.
Alert when CIS check reports Remote Shell Access set to Enabled instead of Disabled.
completion: <group name="custom_windows_rules,compliance"><rule id="100605" level="10"><if_group>sca</if_group><match>AllowRemoteShellAccess</match><description>Lab: Remote Shell Access should remain disabled per CIS guidance</description><group>sca,compliance</group></rule></group>

detection_goal: Detect SSH successes from new or infrequent remote hosts that could signal persistent access beyond normal VPN endpoints.
completion: <group name="local,ssh,authentication"><rule id="100606" level="11"><if_group>sshd</if_group><match>Accepted publickey</match><description>Lab: SSH auth success from unfamiliar remote source</description><group>ssh,lab_unusual_auth,</group></rule></group>

detection_goal: Catch files dropped into directories commonly abused by malware (malicious payloads in suspicious folders).
completion: <group name="custom_windows_rules,syscheck"><rule id="100607" level="13"><if_group>syscheck</if_group><match>folder commonly used by malware</match><description>Lab: Executable dropped in high-risk directory</description><group>syscheck,lab_bad_drop,</group></rule></group>

detection_goal: Flag rootcheck alerts showing Trojaned system utilities to distinguish malicious from benign rootcheck noise.
completion: <group name="custom_rules,rootcheck"><rule id="100608" level="11"><if_group>rootcheck</if_group><match>Trojaned version of file '/bin/diff' detected</match><description>Lab: Rootcheck flagged trojaned /bin/diff</description><group>rootcheck,lab_trojan,</group></rule></group>
